summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of all requested features: the Mission tab has been renamed to Overview throughout the navigation, the Additional Resources tab has been added with a placeholder page, a home page links section with thumbnails has been created with full CRUD operations, and delete functionality with confirmation dialogs has been added to all content sections (Articles, X Posts, Spotlights, Wisdom, Resources, Cybercrime Articles, and Home Page Links). The implementation includes proper backend data models, migration logic, frontend components with dialogs, and consistent UI patterns.
